archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.4.4a: a) questionnaire-based assessments used by the organisation, asking suppliers to assess their own security arrangements (i.e. supplier security self-assessments)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
